Define_D3DKMT_HANDLE
[Constants and Definitions]


Typedefs

typedef unsigned int ADL_D3DKMT_HANDLE
 Handle can be used to create Device Handle when using CreateDevice().

Typedef Documentation

Handle can be used to create Device Handle when using CreateDevice().
